Quote.Author: Deirdre O'Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I think boarding school does give you an independence

Quote.Author: Deirdre O'Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: Yves Saint Laurent will never go out of business so long as I'm buying mountains of Touche Eclat

Quote.Author: Deirdre O'Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: Filling a theatre like the Olympia or Vicar Street on your own name is a very rewarding moment

Quote.Author: Deirdre O'Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I love peppermint tea, as it's much nicer than taking anything chemical for settling your stomach

Quote.Author: Deirdre O'Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is very much an all-or-nothing job

Quote.Author: Deirdre O'Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: You worry about whether you are match-fit, coming back to the stand-up stage

Quote.Author: Deirdre O'Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like doing things by halves, and I realised you can't do stand-up comedy part-time

Quote.Author: Deirdre O'Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew I wanted to be an actress from the age of 13

Quote.Author: Deirdre O'Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no proper money to invest!

Quote.Author: Delta Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I could blame it on the choreography, but it's not a musical. I just had a clumsy moment

Quote.Author: Delta Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to say it with flowers, a single rose says: 'I'm cheap!'

Quote.Author: Delta Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: And then, I do love my shopping, but actually, lounging is the big thing

Quote.Author: Delta Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: One time we did have 300 acres in watermelons. That was fun

Quote.Author: Delta Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: For a while I was living in New Orleans for like 4, 5 years. I had just come back to town

Quote.Author: Delta Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: I like it when I strut

Quote.Author: Delta Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: You're supposed to remember, and still forgive

Quote.Author: Delta Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: Eve wasn't a size 6 and neither am I

Quote.Author: Delta Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved living in London, and I didn't want to leave

Quote.Author: Delta Burke
Quote.QuoteValue: I get in my golf cart with my dogs, I have five dogs

Quote.Author: Demetrius Shipp, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I went to school in Long Beach, and all the seniors I used to kick it with called me Pac

Quote.Author: Demetrius Shipp, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: This is really honest: I have to remind myself not to look another black man as a threat

Quote.Author: Demetrius Shipp, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I vowed to never be on camera down-talking another black man

Quote.Author: Demetrius Shipp, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: He's a layered person, so you have to tackle all the aspects of Tupac individually

Quote.Author: Demetrius Shipp, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: My father's relationship with Pac was something I was proud of

Quote.Author: Demetrius Shipp, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever I do, I just want it to be good

Quote.Author: Demetrius Shipp, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to say that I'm a very passionate person

Quote.Author: Demetrius Shipp, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Black films and television are growing and getting the recognition... and the opportunities

Quote.Author: Demetrius Shipp, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Tupac was a person who was all about love. I feel like that's me, too; that's who I've always been

Quote.Author: Demetrius Shipp, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be a part of bringing people together and sharing that love

Quote.Author: Demi Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Not caring more about what other people think than what you think. That's freedom

Quote.Author: Demi Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of my lowest points were the most exciting opportunities to push through to be a better person

Quote.Author: Demi Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing is most people are afraid to step out, to take a chance beyond their established identity

Quote.Author: Demi Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I have had a love-hate relationship with my body

Quote.Author: Demi Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't come into this life wanting to be anything other than happy

Quote.Author: Demi Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't let your wounds make you become someone you're not

Quote.Author: Demi Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: For the moment I prefer to be a beautiful woman of my age than try desperately to look 30

Quote.Author: Demi Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Life isn't always easy, but it's simple

Quote.Author: Demi Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Certainly I'm passionate and driven and quite relentless when I want something

Quote.Author: Demi Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to acknowledge a problem exists before you can actually go about finding a solution

Quote.Author: Denise Mina
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the negative traits are what makes us love other human beings, the foibles and the flaws

Quote.Author: Denise Mina
Quote.QuoteValue: Journalism is a Darwinian process

Quote.Author: Denise Mina
Quote.QuoteValue: I think graphic novels are closer to prose than film, which is a really different form

Quote.Author: Denise Mina
Quote.QuoteValue: Usually when I'm trying to establish character, I try and find out where they live

Quote.Author: Denise Mina
Quote.QuoteValue: I love bleak things

Quote.Author: Denise Mina
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in London under Thatcher and that really was disgusting. A feeding frenzy

Quote.Author: Denise Mina
Quote.QuoteValue: None of us know what is going to sell or what people want to read

Quote.Author: Denise Mina
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a real emphasis on being witty in Scotland, even in crime novels

Quote.Author: Denise Mina
Quote.QuoteValue: Crime fiction is the fiction of social history. Societies get the crimes they deserve

Quote.Author: Denise Mina
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm terrified to get married. I'm not getting married till my gay friends can

Quote.Author: Dennis Christopher
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not getting involved in sports anymore, except on film. I'm not agile unless a camera's going

Quote.Author: Dennis Christopher
Quote.QuoteValue: I've done a lot of things with theater that I'm very, very proud of

Quote.Author: Dennis Christopher
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a 'Zelig'-like career. I pop up unexpectedly. I'm always kind of around

Quote.Author: Dennis Christopher
Quote.QuoteValue: Character actors have a long shelf life

Quote.Author: Dennis Christopher
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know why every actor doesn't do more plays

Quote.Author: Dennis Christopher
Quote.QuoteValue: There were two things I wanted to be: an actor and a hippie

Quote.Author: Dennis Christopher
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret is that I am Italian

Quote.Author: Dennis Christopher
Quote.QuoteValue: Work has been my lover - I've shied away from any commitments

Quote.Author: Dennis Christopher
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never chosen or rejected a role because of money

Quote.Author: Dennis Christopher
Quote.QuoteValue: I've done a lot of stage in my life, but I never had to dominate a stage for three hours

Quote.Author: Desiigner
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest challenge for me is just knowing how to calm down

Quote.Author: Desiigner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm definitely happy and appreciate all the love everyone's given to me

Quote.Author: Desiigner
Quote.QuoteValue: I played the sax at school. I was in marching band

Quote.Author: Desiigner
Quote.QuoteValue: My grandfather is a blues musician

Quote.Author: Desiigner
Quote.QuoteValue: Even the diss tracks was enhancing 'Panda.'

Quote.Author: Desiigner
Quote.QuoteValue: My sister listened to reggae, and my homies listened to trap music

Quote.Author: Desiigner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm my own favorite artist, but I love everybody's music

Quote.Author: Desiigner
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always on my swag since I was younger

Quote.Author: Desiigner
Quote.QuoteValue: I came from a supportive home with a mommy and a daddy, and they had everything I wanted

Quote.Author: Desiigner
Quote.QuoteValue: Before 'Panda,' I had a buzz already

Quote.Author: Dhani Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: My job description is... being enthusiastic

Quote.Author: Dhani Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I did rebel. I was the rebel in my family, because my dad wanted me to go and just travel with him

Quote.Author: Dhani Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone's seen the Beatles

Quote.Author: Dhani Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge Wu-Tang fan

Quote.Author: Dhani Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I only discovered electronic music as a teenager and I still love the Prodigy and Massive Attack

Quote.Author: Dhani Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Thenewno2 is sort of my little prototype band, really

Quote.Author: Dhani Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm still getting used to being called a composer. A poseur, maybe

Quote.Author: Dhani Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I recently got into 'Lie to Me' with Tim Roth and 'The Mentalist.'

Quote.Author: Dhani Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I have two mini huskies called Woody Guthrie and Edison Guthrie

Quote.Author: Dhani Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Keep your head down at school.' Those are sage words from my dad. They kept me in check for years

Quote.Author: Dhani Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing better than live music. It's raw energy, and raw energy feeds the soul

Quote.Author: Dhani Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm living my future as long as you're living in the present and realize how beautiful life is

Quote.Author: Dhani Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because you wear a bow tie doesn't mean you're a nerd

Quote.Author: Dhani Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Without creation, what are we but stalled in life?

Quote.Author: Dhani Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: People look at you differently if you wear a bow tie, as opposed to a necktie

Quote.Author: Dhani Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Travel around the world is amazing. New people. New-found family, really

Quote.Author: Dhani Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Football is one side of me. Art is another. Travel is another

Quote.Author: Dhani Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Every country I go to, I learn a little bit more about myself

Quote.Author: Dhani Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I want everybody to travel, to travel and not be afraid

Quote.Author: Dhani Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love to be a grinder on some race yacht

Quote.Author: Diane Paulus
Quote.QuoteValue: The musical theater is a glorious and distinctly American innovation in the history of theater

Quote.Author: Diane Paulus
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're a freelance director, you are hired to create the art, and it kind of stops there

Quote.Author: Diane Paulus
Quote.QuoteValue: It's freeing to not be caught up in your own personal baggage

Quote.Author: Diane Paulus
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up with a beautiful gold harp sitting in our living room. My older sister played it

Quote.Author: Diane Paulus
Quote.QuoteValue: Opera is the ultimate art form. It has singing and music and drama and dance and emotion and story

Quote.Author: Diane Paulus
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics, to a degree, is about legislation, administration. You can't be there in the trenches

Quote.Author: Diane Paulus
Quote.QuoteValue: As a director, I never feel that I have the answers

Quote.Author: Diane Paulus
Quote.QuoteValue: I give so much of myself to my work; I want to be with people who are going to be there with me

Quote.Author: Diane Paulus
Quote.QuoteValue: I want an audience that will come sitting forward in their seats

Quote.Author: Diane Paulus
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be in an art bubble

Quote.Author: Diane Sawyer
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're curious, you'll probably be a good journalist because we follow our curiosity like cats

Quote.Author: Diane Sawyer
Quote.QuoteValue: An investigation may take six months. A quick interview, profile, a day

Quote.Author: Diane Sawyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Follow what you are genuinely passionate about and let that guide you to your destination

Quote.Author: Diane Sawyer
Quote.QuoteValue: People assume you can't be shy and be on television. They're wrong

Quote.Author: Diane Sawyer
Quote.QuoteValue: The one lesson I have learned is that there is no substitute for paying attention

Quote.Author: Diane Sawyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I like talking. I didn't know at the time I would have to worry so much about my hair

Quote.Author: Diane Sawyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a contract but it's not a commitment in the ordinary sense. It's our ongoing conversation

Quote.Author: Diane Sawyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Great questions make great reporting

Quote.Author: Diane Sawyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always fascinated by the way memory diffuses fact

Quote.Author: Diane Sawyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the early process of asking questions about a story and deciding which questions matter most

Quote.Author: Dickey Betts
Quote.QuoteValue: I have so many great memories of the Allman Brothers early days. It was an incredible time

Quote.Author: Dickey Betts
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned to climb a tree pretty fast

Quote.Author: Dickey Betts
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to do Gregg Allman songs

Quote.Author: Dickey Betts
Quote.QuoteValue: In 1969, I was playing guitar in several rock bands that toured central Florida

Quote.Author: Dickey Betts
Quote.QuoteValue: Ramblin' was in my blood

Quote.Author: Dickey Betts
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't call myself a jazz player or a blues player

Quote.Author: Dickey Betts
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as the music goes, I like melody

Quote.Author: Dickey Betts
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything comes to an end

Quote.Author: Dickey Betts
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes arguments get publicized so much that it gets blown all the hell out of proportion

Quote.Author: Dickey Betts
Quote.QuoteValue: I really feel like I've written my most effective music in the instrumental realms

Quote.Author: Diego Klattenhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going for that Mark Wahlberg look. Strong and confident

Quote.Author: Diego Klattenhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm extremely patriotic. I'll always be Canadian

Quote.Author: Diego Klattenhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm from a very, very rural place. There's really nobody out there, just roads and farms

Quote.Author: Diego Klattenhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in Nova Scotia, so there weren't a whole lot of rules

Quote.Author: Diego Klattenhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so happy with 'The Blacklist.' Give me more people to shoot and throw them off buildings

Quote.Author: Diego Klattenhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: Cardio is boring for me, so running outside helps to keep me going

Quote.Author: Diego Klattenhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know - to be honest, I don't really model myself after anybody

Quote.Author: Diego Klattenhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: You are always drawing from your personal life and using your imagination to fill in the blanks

Quote.Author: Diego Klattenhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: In Canada, the only weapons you have are for hunting

Quote.Author: Diego Klattenhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been really fortunate to be associated with all these great shows

Quote.Author: Dino De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: I see my face in the mirror, and I said, 'No, my ambition is not to be an actor.'

Quote.Author: Dino De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: My philosophy is very simple. To feel young, you must work as long as you can

Quote.Author: Dino De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: We set ourselves a limit and cut characters which weren't so vital

Quote.Author: Dino De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: Mr Tony Hopkins says he's willing to do it if he likes the script

Quote.Author: Dino De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: I realized the exciting place was behind the camera with the producer, director and so on

Quote.Author: Dino De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: I have two young girls, 8 and 10. They really keep me young

Quote.Author: Dino De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: These scenes deal with what happened before Hannibal Lecter was captured for the first time

Quote.Author: Dino De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: Making movies is all about instinct

Quote.Author: Dino De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: If no producer, no movie

Quote.Author: Dino De Laurentiis
Quote.QuoteValue: The pope dies, you get another pope

Quote.Author: Dirk Benedict
Quote.QuoteValue: America is terrified of the passage of time. Prozac Nation. Land of Face Lifts

Quote.Author: Dirk Benedict
Quote.QuoteValue: I have written two nonfiction books, I'm embarrassed to say

Quote.Author: Dirk Benedict
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to have great success, you'd better give them what they want, but so be it

Quote.Author: Dirk Benedict
Quote.QuoteValue: I can still fit into my Battlestar Galactica costume!

Quote.Author: Dirk Benedict
Quote.QuoteValue: Life: my favorite occupation

Quote.Author: Dirk Benedict
Quote.QuoteValue: The best things in life are usually difficult

Quote.Author: Dirk Benedict
Quote.QuoteValue: Change is good. And in fact unavoidable

Quote.Author: Dirk Benedict
Quote.QuoteValue: From Fred Astaire I learned discipline and hard work

Quote.Author: Dirk Benedict
Quote.QuoteValue: Generally speaking, actors are allowed NO input. Actors are dumb

Quote.Author: Dirk Benedict
Quote.QuoteValue: Movies are movies, television is television

Quote.Author: Domenico Dolce
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst times can be the best if you think with positive energy

Quote.Author: Domenico Dolce
Quote.QuoteValue: This is the problem today. Men and women have switched places. The woman now acts more like the man

Quote.Author: Domenico Dolce
Quote.QuoteValue: Do I make fashion mistakes? Yes, but I won't say what

Quote.Author: Domenico Dolce
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very curious person

Quote.Author: Domenico Dolce
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not necessary to be too avant-garde, because you risk not being understood

Quote.Author: Domenico Dolce
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm obsessed with jackets

Quote.Author: Domenico Dolce
Quote.QuoteValue: The fashion system has killed fashion

Quote.Author: Domenico Dolce
Quote.QuoteValue: I clear my wardrobe of anything I'm not wearing and give the clothes to charity

Quote.Author: Domenico Dolce
Quote.QuoteValue: If you open my wardrobe, it's very boring

Quote.Author: Domenico Dolce
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to dance. I want to live

Quote.Author: Dominic Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: Grief jumps out at you when you're least expecting it

Quote.Author: Dominic Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing I hate more than meeting someone who has forgotten the art of conversing

Quote.Author: Dominic Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very easy life, I can wander around

Quote.Author: Dominic Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: To a certain extent I suppose all actors are big kids

Quote.Author: Dominic Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: I like being in focus, in the moment, changing and adapting and creating and advancing a scene

Quote.Author: Dominic Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the exciting and enjoyable aspects of acting is being in the environment with another actor

Quote.Author: Dominic Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see myself as being a heart-throb at all

Quote.Author: Dominic Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: Any son of a dictator, I'm sure, has major issues with their relationship with their father

Quote.Author: Dominic Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: I suppose there's an anger in all of us. Some hidden rage that you keep at bay

Quote.Author: Dominic Cooper
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course you can find something exciting and dynamic in any character you want to portray

Quote.Author: Don Bluth
Quote.QuoteValue: We're waiting for the pendulum to swing back again, which I am absolutely confident it will

Quote.Author: Don Bluth
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to be able to make animation for much less... Less is not the studio's way

Quote.Author: Don Bluth
Quote.QuoteValue: The studios will go wherever they smell money. It's like sharks to the blood

Quote.Author: Don Bluth
Quote.QuoteValue: Reese Witherspoon. She's sophisticated enough that you just like her. You like her and she's smart

Quote.Author: Don Bluth
Quote.QuoteValue: Usually with things, you go where you can find the financing to do it

Quote.Author: Don Bluth
Quote.QuoteValue: How can you have a director that doesn't go to work with the crew every day and talk to them?

Quote.Author: Don Bluth
Quote.QuoteValue: Dragon's Lair 3D is about as close as you can come to controlling an animated feature film

Quote.Author: Don Bluth
Quote.QuoteValue: We'd love to do Space Ace 3D. It has a lot of potential. But, it is really up to the publishers

Quote.Author: Don Bluth
Quote.QuoteValue: There's about 260 rooms in the new castle which you go through, but it's all about the game play

Quote.Author: Don Bluth
Quote.QuoteValue: Shelf-life for a regular video game usually is about three to five years, and that's it

Quote.Author: Don Nickles
Quote.QuoteValue: ALEC is one great organization, I think, for growing future political leaders

Quote.Author: Don Nickles
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there's bipartisan support in the Senate to pass a good reform bill

Quote.Author: Don Nickles
Quote.QuoteValue: I think most corporate executives are good honorable honest men and women who do good work

Quote.Author: Don Nickles
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, we want to make sure there's not securities fraud

Quote.Author: Don Nickles
Quote.QuoteValue: If people are going to be cooking the books, you're in trouble

Quote.Author: Don Nickles
Quote.QuoteValue: My last comment was, though, that Congress has cooked the books

Quote.Author: Don Nickles
Quote.QuoteValue: I still happen to think the United States is the greatest place in the world to invest

Quote.Author: Don Nickles
Quote.QuoteValue: I always intended to return to the private sector

Quote.Author: Don Nickles
Quote.QuoteValue: Jim mentioned I was an ALEC member, and that's correct

Quote.Author: Don Nickles
Quote.QuoteValue: My State Senate district was in the northern part of Oklahoma and they were redrawing the districts

Quote.Author: Donald McCaig
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the job of the dog trainer to summon the dog's genetics, not to impose man's will over dog's

Quote.Author: Donald McCaig
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm out of the terse Hemingway school

Quote.Author: Donald McCaig
Quote.QuoteValue: Had we settled in Pennsylvania, there's no way I would have written a Confederate novel

Quote.Author: Donald McCaig
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to train a dog to think

Quote.Author: Donald McCaig
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a workaday writer

Quote.Author: Donald McCaig
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather talk about dogs than about me

Quote.Author: Donald McCaig
Quote.QuoteValue: In life, sometimes it pays off when you really don't give a damn

Quote.Author: Donald McCaig
Quote.QuoteValue: A sheepdog trial is the most difficult test of a man and dog ever devised

Quote.Author: Donald McCaig
Quote.QuoteValue: That we have altered the dog genetically is well understood; it is hardly known how they changed us

Quote.Author: Donald McCaig
Quote.QuoteValue: The Civil War has a tremendous moral and emotional force

Quote.Author: Donnie Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: We're entertainers, while people want us to be gods

Quote.Author: Donnie Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: It's rare that I come across actors who are willing to work as hard on the material as I am

Quote.Author: Donnie Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not hard to keep up the image we chose. It's not hard to stay yourselves

Quote.Author: Donnie Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: In the end I'm the only one who knows me

Quote.Author: Donnie Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to ground most of my characters in reality somehow. That's kind of what I bring to the table

Quote.Author: Donnie Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of kids do look up to us. But there are just as many elderly people to put us down

Quote.Author: Donnie Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I love food shows: Anthony Bourdain, Iron Chef, Chopped, you name it

Quote.Author: Donnie Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the rush of being creative. I really think I live for it

Quote.Author: Donnie Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very much a leader in a lot of the work that I do or that I've done in my career

Quote.Author: Donnie Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a fan of good horror movies

Quote.Author: Dorothy Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I was the first movie star to plunge into night-time soap opera

Quote.Author: Dorothy Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I never turned down a mother role

Quote.Author: Dorothy Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved to get all dusty and ride horses and plant potatoes and cotton

Quote.Author: Dorothy Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born in Everett; I went through grade school in Everett, high school in Seattle

Quote.Author: Dorothy Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was a minister, so I was a P.K., a preacher's kid

Quote.Author: Dorothy Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I had had no art training

Quote.Author: Dorothy Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody said Peyton Place would be a mistake

Quote.Author: Dorothy Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: Television wasn't prestigious

Quote.Author: Dorothy Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a bridesmaid at a wedding in one picture

Quote.Author: Dorothy Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing I did at RKO of any note was lose my Texas accent

Quote.Author: Douglas Tompkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to see anything natural get hurt

Quote.Author: Douglas Tompkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm short on celebrations and long on getting to work

Quote.Author: Douglas Tompkins
Quote.QuoteValue: Look at how fast technology is developing

Quote.Author: Douglas Tompkins
Quote.QuoteValue: National Parks are the gold standard for conservation

Quote.Author: Douglas Tompkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a social justice supporter, but there is no social justice on a dead planet

Quote.Author: Douglas Tompkins
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to destroy the planet, you can kiss social justice goodbye. The earth comes first

Quote.Author: Douglas Tompkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never, ever tried to make life easy for myself

Quote.Author: Douglas Tompkins
Quote.QuoteValue: Every single national park had some component of private philanthropy

Quote.Author: Douglas Tompkins
Quote.QuoteValue: Capitalism may have all sorts of things that are good, but ultimately, it's bad for everyone

Quote.Author: Douglas Tompkins
Quote.QuoteValue: It is really your behaviour that determines whether you're a patriot

Quote.Author: Douglas Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Use plants to bring life

Quote.Author: Douglas Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I see the same coffee table everywhere. It's mass marketing

Quote.Author: Douglas Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah, I spent about 20 years in a dorm room. It took me a while to graduate

Quote.Author: Douglas Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as a guilty pleasure

Quote.Author: Douglas Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I was supposed to be the antithesis of Frank

Quote.Author: Douglas Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the young, edgy New Yorker

Quote.Author: Douglas Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm opinionated. I always stick to my design plan. I don't waver

Quote.Author: Douglas Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: In two days, it's hard to to get the quality you would normally want for a design project

Quote.Author: Douglas Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Inexpensive is good

Quote.Author: Douglas Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've made an incredible amount of money stealing fans from homeowners

Quote.Author: Drew Pomeranz
Quote.QuoteValue: A change of scenery can help everything

Quote.Author: Drew Pomeranz
Quote.QuoteValue: Every outing is a learning experience

Quote.Author: Drew Pomeranz
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a thrower. I think I'm more of a pitcher now

Quote.Author: Drew Pomeranz
Quote.QuoteValue: You can work this hard and sometimes not get recognition for it

Quote.Author: Drew Pomeranz
Quote.QuoteValue: I've done literally everything there is to do on a baseball field as a pitcher

Quote.Author: Drew Pomeranz
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to pitch well enough for us to win. In my mind, that's what it's all about

Quote.Author: Drew Pomeranz
Quote.QuoteValue: No one wants to be known as a six-inning guy

Quote.Author: Drew Pomeranz
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind walking guys as long as I don't give up runs

Quote.Author: Drew Pomeranz
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to do a better job of learning how to adjust

Quote.Author: Drew Pomeranz
Quote.QuoteValue: It's pretty frustrating waiting for anything

Quote.Author: Duane G. Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm looking forward to coming back, back to Earth, the landing, the views
